     ``` user = User.last``` #or ```user = User.find_by(github_handle: "yourgithubhandle") ```
     ``` user.roles.create(name: "organizer") ```
     You can assign yourself other roles in the same way. If however you assign

body:
I think that instruction is probably still valid. I guess it depends on what you want to do, and there can probably be a role that is not covered by our initial fake data, so there would be no one to impersonate for that role.

We can definitely improve this part of the readme in a separate PR if necessary. @carpodaster let me know if we should change this now and if not, feel free to merge! 🎉

body_text:
I think that instruction is probably still valid. I guess it depends on what you want to do, and there can probably be a role that is not covered by our initial fake data, so there would be no one to impersonate for that role.
We can definitely improve this part of the readme in a separate PR if necessary. @carpodaster let me know if we should change this now and if not, feel free to merge! 🎉
